allow: Bash(find tests -name "*.rs" -exec sed -i '' 's/fn open_position(&mut self,/fn open_position(\&self,/g; s/fn close_position(&mut self,/fn close_position(\&self,/g; s/fn cancel_order(&mut self,/fn cancel_order(\&self,/g; s/fn modify_order(&mut self,/fn modify_order(\&self,/g; s/fn cancel_all_orders(&mut self,/fn cancel_all_orders(\&self,/g; s/fn set_leverage(&mut self,/fn set_leverage(\&self,/g; s/fn set_margin_type(&mut self,/fn set_margin_type(\&self,/g; s/fn set_position_mode(&mut self,/fn set_position_mode(\&self,/g' {} ;)
